titles.title: Tariff Suspension and Trade Act of 2000
Imported Cigarette Compliance Act of 2000
Product Development and Testing Act of 2000
Providing for the concurrence by the House, with an amendment, in the amendment of the Senate to H.R. 4868.

action.text: Mr. Crane moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 644.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/24/2000--Introduced. TABLE OF CONTENTS: Title I: Tariff Provisions Subtitle A: Temporary Duty Suspensions and Reductions Subtitle B: Other Tariff Provisions Subtitle C: Effective Date Title II: Other Trade Provisions Title III: Extension of Nondiscriminatory Treatment to Georgia Title IV: Imported Cigarette Compliance Provides for the concurrence of the House, with an amendment, in the amendment of the Senate to H.R. 4868 (tariff suspension and trade).
